column1: Wildberry Pancakes and Cafe////A couple weeks ago
column2: I came in for breakfast with a collegue from my office.  We were primarily dressed up due to critical meetings we had to attend that afternoon
column3: and it was a relaxing time; we ordered
column4: and weren't bothered much by staff coming to the table very much.  Our breakfast was ok
column5: and we made our meetings on time.
